articles.description: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) is a common condition that affects approximately 116 million women around the world, reports the World Health Organization (WHO). It is a hormonal condition that affects women's ovaries. According to the UK National Health Ser…
articles.content:
According to the NHS, PCOS is one of the most common causes of female infertility. "Many women discover they have PCOS when they're having difficulty getting pregnant," the UK health body reports.
